A stack of books: In the beginning there was a ball. In a bowl mix all this was that there is in the world. And apart from this world nothing existed. Gradually the ball pulled her emptiness and began to increase in size. When a void filled balloon, it emerged polar energy. Gradually took on energy material substance. Bright took the image of women. She called herself Einhasad. Black took the image of men. He called himself the Grand Prix Cain... Initially formed light (=Einhasad) and darkness (=Gran Kain), and around, a system of light and darkness. [Quest _10293_SevenSignsForbiddenBook book_q10293_0.htm|Select this book]
